Word Break

# Word Break

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                      | Support     |
| -------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
break-normal
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
word-break: normal
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-words
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-all
```          | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-keep
```         | 🌐 Web only |
